title: Bison
description: A brown bison shown in full profile with horns, a beard, and woolly mane. Also called a buffalo in North America.
apple_vendor_description: The bison emoji on Apple devices is a powerful and majestic representation, crafted with Apple's renowned 3D rendering and tactile design. Its shaggy fur is detailed with subtle highlights and shadows, and its sturdy build is emphasized by smooth gradients, giving it a lifelike presence. On Apple devices, this emoji symbolizes strength, resilience, and a connection to nature or the American West, often used in contexts related to wildlife, journeys, or formidable challenges.
